sentences.en: After 1870 the Siemens regenerative gas furnace replaced the coke - fired furnace.
sentences.cn: 1870年后,西门子用蓄热式煤气炉代替焦炭炉.

sentences.en: Conclusion: MEBO can promote regenerative healing of diabetic skin ulcer.
sentences.cn: 结论: 美宝湿润烧伤膏可促进糖尿病性皮肤溃疡再生愈合.

sentences.en: Infection inhibits the regenerative power of the bone marrow.
sentences.cn: 感染抑制骨髓的再生能力.

sentences.en: It is, therefore, interesting to incorporate tissue regenerative properties in dental com - posites.
sentences.cn: 因此开发牙科树脂材料的再生功能是有益的.

sentences.en: MEBT achieved the goal of in situ regenerative repair of the skin.
sentences.cn: 达到了烧伤皮肤原位再生修复之目的.

sentences.en: MPS has a regenerative effect on a disturbed connective tissue metabolism.
sentences.cn: 多磺酸粘多糖能改善受损结缔组织代谢从而促进组织再生.

sentences.en: Objective To explore origin of regenerative nerve after end - to - side neurorrhaphy in rats.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨神经端侧吻合术后支配靶器官的再生神经的来源.

sentences.en: Regenerative braking is the best method, though not necessarily the most economic.
sentences.cn: 反馈制动虽然并不一定是最经济的方式, 但却是最好的方式.

sentences.en: Regenerative combustion is the most advanced energy saving technology.
sentences.cn: 蓄热燃烧技术是目前最先进的节能技术.

sentences.en: Regenerative feedwater heaters are important auxiliary facilities of power plant.
sentences.cn: 回热加热器是火电机组重要的辅助设备.

sentences.en: Technological features and skills about the efficient regenerative chamber are described.
sentences.cn: 介绍了高效蓄热室技术的特点及技术关键.

sentences.en: The corrosion problem is less in regenerative plants since the heating surface is provided by stones.
sentences.cn: 在蓄冷器工厂中,因为加热表面是石头提供的,所以腐蚀问题较少.

sentences.en: The principle and character of regenerative combustion technology are described briefly.
sentences.cn: 简述了蓄热式燃烧技术的原理和特点.

sentences.en: This year the regenerative paradigm is to be anchored.
sentences.cn: 今年再生的范式将被锚定.

sentences.en: Thus, Scorplo's link with sex and regenerative forces is strengthened.
sentences.cn: 因此, 天蝎座的性再生能力也很强.

trans.tran_cn: 恢复的，新生的，再生的，回热的
trans.tran_en: Regenerative powers or processes cause something to heal or become active again after it has been damaged or inactive
